articles.author: Emma Rennie
articles.title: Former Australian captain Lyn Larsen to be inducted into Cricket Hall of Fame at the Gabba
articles.description: Lyn Larsen is about to receive one on the highest honours in Australian cricket, after captaining the women's team to some of its biggest wins in the 1980s and 90s, but says none of it could have happened without her teammates.
articles.content:
Lyn Larsen will never forget the moment she was asked to captain the Australian women's cricket team although she thinks it may have cost New South Wales a national title.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
